data.title: Alphabetical Master List of '60s Films - R & S — Cinema60
data.meta_description: An alphabetical list of all 1960s films that start with “R” and “S”
data.text:
R

• Rachel, Rachel (1968, Director: Paul Newman | Stars: Joanne Woodward, James Olson, Kate Harrington, Estelle Parsons)

• The Rain People (1969, Director: Francis Ford Coppola | Stars: James Caan, Shirley Knight, Robert Duvall, Marya Zimmet)

• A Raisin in the Sun (1961, Director: Daniel Petrie | Stars: Sidney Poitier, Claudia McNeil, Ruby Dee, Diana Sands) (Ep #12 - Black Masculinity in the 60s)

• Rapture (1965, Director: John Guillermin | Stars: Melvyn Douglas, Patricia Gozzi, Dean Stockwell, Gunnel Lindblom) (Read Bart's review)

• The Rare Breed (1966, Director: Andrew V. McLaglen | Stars: James Stewart, Maureen O'Hara, Brian Keith, Juliet Mills)

• Rasputin: The Mad Monk (1966, Director: Don Sharp | Stars: Christopher Lee, Barbara Shelley, Richard Pasco, Francis Matthews)

• The Raven (1963, Director: Roger Corman | Stars: Vincent Price, Peter Lorre, Boris Karloff, Hazel Court)

• Raven's End (1963, Director: Bo Widerberg | Stars: Thommy Berggren, Keve Hjelm, Emy Storm, Ingvar Hirdwall) (Read Jenna's review) (Ep #21 - Kiss, Marry, Kill in the 60s: 1963)

• The Red and the White (1967, Director: Miklós Jancsó | Stars: József Madaras, Tibor Molnár, András Kozák, Jácint Juhász)

• Red Beard (1965, Director: Akira Kurosawa | Stars: Toshirô Mifune, Yûzô Kayama, Tsutomu Yamazaki, Reiko Dan)

• Red Desert (1964, Director: Michelangelo Antonioni | Stars: Monica Vitti, Richard Harris, Carlo Chionetti, Xenia Valderi) (Read Jenna's review) (Ep #16 - Michelangelo Antonioni in the 60s)

• The Red Light Bandit (1968, Director: Rogério Sganzerla | Stars: Helena Ignez, Paulo Villaça, Pagano Sobrinho, Luiz Linhares) (Read Jenna's review) (Ep #19 - Brazilian Cinema Novo in the 60s)

• Reflections in a Golden Eye (1967, Director: John Huston | Stars: Elizabeth Taylor, Marlon Brando, Brian Keith, Julie Harris) (Read Jenna's review)

• The Reivers (1969, Director: Mark Rydell | Stars: Steve McQueen, Sharon Farrell, Ruth White, Michael Constantine)

• The Reluctant Astronaut (1967, Director: Edward Montagne | Stars: Don Knotts, Leslie Nielsen, Joan Freeman, Jesse White)

• The Reptile (1966, Director: John Gilling | Stars: Noel Willman, Jennifer Daniel, Ray Barrett, Jacqueline Pearce)

• Reptilicus (1961, Directors: Poul Bang, Sidney W. Pink | Stars: Bent Mejding, Asbjørn Andersen, Povl Wøldike, Ann Smyrner)

• Repulsion (1965, Director: Roman Polanski | Stars: Catherine Deneuve, Ian Hendry, John Fraser, Yvonne Furneaux) (Read Jenna's review)

• Requiem for a Heavyweight (1962, Director: Ralph Nelson | Stars: Anthony Quinn, Jackie Gleason, Mickey Rooney, Julie Harris)

• The Restaurant (1966, Director: Jacques Besnard | Stars: Louis de Funès, Bernard Blier, Maria-Rosa Rodriguez, Venantino Venantini)

• Return of the Seven (1966, Director: Burt Kennedy | Stars: Yul Brynner, Robert Fuller, Julián Mateos, Warren Oates)

• Ride in the Whirlwind (1966, Director: Monte Hellman | Stars: Jack Nicholson, Cameron Mitchell, Millie Perkins, Katherine Squire)

• Ride the High Country (1962, Director: Sam Peckinpah | Stars: Joel McCrea, Randolph Scott, Mariette Hartley, Ron Starr)

• Riot on Sunset Strip (1967, Director: Arthur Dreifuss | Stars: Aldo Ray, Mimsy Farmer, Michael Evans, Laurie Mock) (Read Jenna's review) (Ep #13 - LSD Movies in 1967)

• The Road to Hong Kong (1962, Director: Norman Panama | Stars: Bing Crosby, Bob Hope, Joan Collins, Robert Morley)

• Robin and the 7 Hoods (1964, Director: Gordon Douglas | Stars: Frank Sinatra, Dean Martin, Sammy Davis Jr., Bing Crosby) (Read Jenna's review) (Ep #8 - Musicals in 1964)

• Robinson Crusoe on Mars (1964, Director: Byron Haskin | Stars: Paul Mantee, Victor Lundin, Adam West, The Woolly Monkey)

• Rocco and His Brothers (1960, Director: Luchino Visconti | Stars: Alain Delon, Renato Salvatori, Annie Girardot, Claudia Cardinale) (Read Jenna's review) (Ep #5 - Kiss, Marry, Kill in the 60s: 1960 Edition)

• The Roman Spring of Mrs. Stone (1961, Director: José Quintero | Stars: Vivien Leigh, Warren Beatty, Coral Browne, Jill St. John) (Read Jenna's review) (Ep #24 - Tennessee Williams in the 60s)

• Romeo and Juliet (1968, Director: Franco Zeffirelli | Stars: Leonard Whiting, Olivia Hussey, John McEnery, Milo O'Shea)

• Rosemary's Baby (1968, Director: Roman Polanski | Stars: Mia Farrow, John Cassavetes, Ruth Gordon, Sidney Blackmer) (Read Jenna's review) (Ep #18 - Aviva Briefel's 60s Pick: Rosemary's Baby)

• The Round-Up (1966, Director: Miklós Jancsó | Stars: János Görbe, Zoltán Latinovits, Tibor Molnár, Gábor Agárdi)

• Roustabout (1964, Director: John Rich | Stars: Elvis Presley, Barbara Stanwyck, Joan Freeman, Leif Erickson) (Read Jenna's review)

• Run Home, Slow (1965, Director: Ted Brenner | Stars: Mercedes McCambridge, Linda Gaye Scott, Allen Richards, Gary Kent) (Read Jenna's review)

• The Russians Are Coming! The Russians Are Coming! (1966, Director: Norman Jewison | Stars: Carl Reiner, Eva Marie Saint, Alan Arkin, Brian Keith) (Read Jenna's review) (Read Bart's review) (Ep #4 - Cold War Comedies in the 60s)

S

• Samurai Assassin (1965, Director: Kihachi Okamoto | Stars: Toshirô Mifune, Keiju Kobayashi, Michiyo Aratama, Yûnosuke Itô)

• Samurai Rebellion (1967, Director: Masaki Kobayashi | Stars: Toshirô Mifune, Yôko Tsukasa, Gô Katô, Tatsuyoshi Ehara)

• San Francisco (1968, Director: Anthony Stern)

• The Sand Pebbles (1966, Director: Robert Wise | Stars: Steve McQueen, Richard Attenborough, Richard Crenna, Candice Bergen)

• The Sandpiper (1965, Director: Vincente Minnelli | Stars: Elizabeth Taylor, Richard Burton, Eva Marie Saint, Charles Bronson)

• Sanjuro (1962, Director: Akira Kurosawa | Stars: Toshirô Mifune, Tatsuya Nakadai, Keiju Kobayashi, Yûnosuke Itô)

• Seduced and Abandoned (1964, Director: Pietro Germi | Stars: Saro Urzì, Stefania Sandrelli, Aldo Puglisi, Lando Buzzanca) (Read Jenna's review)

• Send Me No Flowers (1964, Director: Norman Jewison | Stars: Rock Hudson, Doris Day, Tony Randall, Paul Lynde)

• Sergeant Rutledge (1960, Director: John Ford | Stars: Jeffrey Hunter, Woody Strode, Constance Towers, Billie Burke)

• Sergeants 3 (1962, Director: John Sturges | Stars: Frank Sinatra, Dean Martin, Sammy Davis Jr., Peter Lawford) (Read Jenna's review)

• The Servant (1963, Director: Joseph Losey | Stars: Dirk Bogarde, Sarah Miles, Wendy Craig, James Fox) (Read Jenna's review)

• Seven Days in May (1964, Director: John Frankenheimer | Stars: Burt Lancaster, Kirk Douglas, Fredric March, Ava Gardner)

• Shadows of Forgotten Ancestors (1965, Director: Sergei Parajanov | Stars: Ivan Mykolaichuk, Larisa Kadochnikova, Tatyana Bestayeva, Spartak Bagashvili) (Read Jenna's review)

• Shalako (1968, Director: Edward Dmytryk | Stars: Sean Connery, Brigitte Bardot, Stephen Boyd, Jack Hawkins) (Read Jenna's review)

• Shame (1968, Director: Ingmar Bergman | Stars: Liv Ullmann, Max von Sydow, Sigge Fürst, Gunnar Björnstrand)

• She (1965, Director: Robert Day | Stars: Ursula Andress, Peter Cushing, Bernard Cribbins, John Richardson)

• Shenandoah (1965, Director: Andrew V. McLaglen | Stars: James Stewart, Doug McClure, Glenn Corbett, Patrick Wayne)
